Html:
Hi,

Does anyone have any Prism code that implements the Screen Conductor and Factory pattern that John Papa discusses in the blog at the following link:

http://johnpapa.net/silverlight/building-a-presentation-framework-with-prism-for-silverlight/

He mentions in another blog entry that he's going to be doing a MSDN article that will give more details and code, but it appears that article hasn't been published yet.

Thanks!!

Hi

You can download IdeaBlade’s Prism Explorer source code, that uses the Screen Factory pattern. I believe the current version does not use screen conductors.

You can read more about the Prism explorer, factories and conductors in these posts from Ward Bell:

  • Birth and Death of M-V-VM Triads
  • Screen Factory

Please let me know if this helps.

Damian Schenkelman
http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman
